title: Unfair Punishment
body:
So I got a 10 game chat restriction for going afk in a game and the only toxic thing I said was "how are you so bad". I literally never go afk in games and was having a bad day outside of league. The blitz also inted and trolled until I went afk. I am fine with the chat restriction (it honestly makes you think before you type toxic stuff), but am I no longer eligible for the end of season rewards? I have played league for 3 years and have never been banned and I cant find any concrete answer anywhere else.

The chat log I was given with my 10 day suspension:

 Game 1
IceBaerg: ..
IceBaerg: how
IceBaerg: are you so bad
IceBaerg: blitz killed himself on purpouse
IceBaerg: well now he is trying to steal cs
IceBaerg: plz repior
IceBaerg: im not putting up with that guys bs
IceBaerg: yep
IceBaerg: report blitz
IceBaerg: as you should
IceBaerg: sure am
IceBaerg: had to put up with trolls for 3 games in a row
IceBaerg: im done for now
IceBaerg: he killed himself and got me killed twice
IceBaerg: and then proceeded to take as much cs as possible
IceBaerg: and?
IceBaerg: why should I have to put up with that asshole
IceBaerg: its 1/8
IceBaerg: and that isnt because I afk'd
IceBaerg: 3 mins til we can ff
IceBaerg: not going to mean much
IceBaerg: me joining the game doesnt change the fact that blitz is trolling
IceBaerg: and the fact that he doesnt deserve the win
IceBaerg: and brand too plz
IceBaerg: so why arent you guys surrendering?
IceBaerg: just wasting your own time
IceBaerg: look if I was still trying to play blitz would have trolled harder and I would have died more giving the other team more cs
IceBaerg: he isnt trolling only because im afk
IceBaerg: im not the one who inted to make his adc go afk
IceBaerg: im not being toxic 
IceBaerg: its a dick move on my part to go afk but its way more of a dick move to troll and make that adc go afk
IceBaerg: if someone comes up to you and shoots you and you shoot them back whos at fault
IceBaerg: he sure as  hell did

replies.body:
Lobbying for reports is considered harassment which falls under verbal abuse. No matter what anyone else does no one "makes you afk" that is your choice. 

Punishment deserved.

Per the [ranked reward eligibility](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/115011781068), you are eligible as long as you don't have these chat restrictions when the season ends.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and our PB team can go over this with you directly and offer some more context towards these restrictions.
